title: I think we can all agree that Jinx needs a new skin, introducing Astro Girl or Retro Jinx
body:
{{champion:222}} 

My ability ideas are, her ult can be an asteroid or meteor shooting across map, her zap! could just be like a ray gun, and her chompers can be little rovers. An idea for a joke could be jinx saying "I'm out of this world!" or something similar, her dance would be the moonwalk, and her b animation would be her taking off her helmet and floating away like shes in 0 gravity. Please respond with any different ideas you had in mind! :) -iBlinkXP

replies.body:
Awesome!

She'd need to go "pew pew, pew!" while shooting the minigun... lol

The skin I'm waiting for is battle bunny jinx, but instead of being like Rivens skin it's junx in a big pink bunny costume, her machine gun could be a basket with gun barrels that shoots painted eggs and fishbones could be a giant carrot, the flame chompers could be replaced with marshmallow peeps
This has been a thing for awhile now
Love that art
this is a pretty old skin concept, but im glad somebody revived it!
sailor moon perhaps
we need a groovy jinx- dont let zilean hanging- make her rockets colorful and shit and the her ult leaves a happy face on the ground
Her ult could be Bullet Bill from Mario
yes, this is the best jinx skin idea i have seen so far. i would buy it instantly, jinx needs a new skin so much.

I would certainly buy a new Jinx skin.

I know Mafia Jinx isn't popular but any other skin she has would be missing the "What's in my violin case? Violence~" line, which I adore.
 ~Uiru

A former colleague of mine is the artist responsible for this, and it's already about a year old, I think.  It's cool that you are sharing it with the community, but I have to say that I take a little offense to the idea that you're "introducing" it when I know for a fact that it's not yours.
I like this idea i thing this is good
Riot has to make this skin.  Its just the best
Wow, the retro sci fi look works really well with her.
{{champion:17}} {{champion:111}}  join the club
I have seen this picture before..

I love this idea 
also riot we need a new zed skin pls :3

> [{quoted}](name=mobius1galm16,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0vRvnk5F,comment-id=0024,timestamp=2014-12-23T20:36:56.907+0000)
>
> I love this idea 
> also riot we need a new zed skin pls :3

No we don't.

umm yes we do
zed only has 1 skin not including his SKT skin which is only available after the season ends

> [{quoted}](name=mobius1galm16,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0vRvnk5F,comment-id=002400000000,timestamp=2014-12-23T22:14:35.563+0000)
>
> umm yes we do
> zed only has 1 skin not including his SKT skin which is only available after the season ends

You still need to consider it a skin doesnt matter if legacy or not. that would be like saying Riven needs a skin because her last one was released almost 2 years ago!
I don't think you understand zed has 1 skin just 1
This is a great concept. I really like the theme.  It would be cool to play with a 60/ 70's space themed skin.
Very good idea.
I like how she's standing on Heimer's face, I've always hated that guy. :D
I'd still prefer that Heartseeker Jinx skin someone posted about a while ago, especially with Valentines Day around the corner.
Would LOVE a winter skin for Jinx or a Beach skin. I only play Jinx and would love to have more skins for her=)
Reminds me of Space Dandy.

I agree with this. I feel like their are so many champions out there who have had only one skin for far too long. Sometimes I wish my artistic skills were good enough to produce a whole bunch of skins, but i digress. Someone out there, either Riot or the League community, needs to get this going. For far to long, new skins have came out for champs who already have like 6 skins already. While these skins are just SO awesome, I wonder why it is that someone like Jinx, Braum, or even Azir only have ONE other skin. They've been out for months, and STILL they only have their one other skin. All I'm saying is lets start showing these champs that have only their one other skin some more attention when creating new skin ideas. Good on you iBlinkXP.
I think there is a great chance that her 2 skin will be the 2015 Heartseeker skin

I would really love Jinx♥ to get a new skin. but this one is just... Mafia Jinx is already a 1920ish-themed skin and I'm not really diggin the bundled Astro theme here. honestly, I really don't think Jinx needs another 1920-60 themed skin. I mean, its not a bad skin concept its just as far as Retro goes, its not far enough from Mafia Jinx and comes too close in between the Arcade and Astronaut line. I already own Mafia Jinx which I rarely use(only got Mafia cause it was on sale) so I wouldn't spend RP on this(even if it went on sale).

Lunar Revel would be amazing(in an outfit kinda like Asuka Kazama's Geisha dress which I remembered was close in Jinx's style. also Fireworks!!!). but would really love Popstar Jinx with Fishbones being a boombox and Pow Pow being a Guitar. would look really nice on her.

Sincerely, concerned Ahri and Jinx main. ♥
This has been posted before, long ago... I'd buy it. Especially if the splash art has her kicking Heimerdinger in the face.
I would totally pay for this... What a beautiful concept.

Its really tiring that Riot hasn't made a new skin for her and let other champions released after her have another one. 
Like really Riot this is a great idea use it please, they say they are coming up with skin concepts but um there's a great one here. 
Just because shes harder to make a skin for her doesn't mean you should keep us waiting!!!
Makes me think of Ulala from Space Channel 5 with her Tension Blaster
Riot has officially stated that they will make a new jinx skin but it's to hard so they'll do something else until they feel like it
It is okay there are better skins ideas for her.
Jetsons!
i luv this Skin desginee, i would deffiently buy this.
NICE!

We dont all agreed her basse skin is already AWSOME.
And I and almost sure it would be my favorite skin so :D.
very nice idea, i would actually buy jinx with this skin if it were in game!
I'd buy it. And I don't even play Jinx much anymore. :P
yes plz
It's actually good.
{{champion:134}}
Poor heimerdinger
Screw Jinx, where's Zac's skin?

I love this, I am ADC and this is a lot better then the last skin that I have 

Rito please give{{champion:222}} a skin ^^
                                                                      *
*throws wallet at screen*
I hate her, I hope she will remain with 1 ugly skin forever
